name: Fabrication Lab
description: The **Fabrication Lab Event Publisher** is a critical application in the manufacturing ecosystem, responsible for streaming real-time events related to production, shipping, maintenance, quality control, inventory, HR, and sensor monitoring. It provides a structured event-driven architecture that enables seamless tracking of product lifecycle stages, employee access, machine health, material availability, and environmental conditions within a fabrication lab. By publishing standardized events, the system enhances operational visibility, ensures timely decision-making, and facilitates automation across multiple manufacturing sites, optimizing efficiency and reducing downtime.
